body_html: In the current version of doc-string, I use i to denote run between (i - 1)-th and i-th restart, i.e. i starts from 1. This puts i - 1 to the exponents. Maybe it would be better to start with run i = 0. The epochs in PyTorch start with 0 as well. The parameter T_max could be then called T_0. Please let me know.
body_text: In the current version of doc-string, I use i to denote run between (i - 1)-th and i-th restart, i.e. i starts from 1. This puts i - 1 to the exponents. Maybe it would be better to start with run i = 0. The epochs in PyTorch start with 0 as well. The parameter T_max could be then called T_0. Please let me know.
body: In the current version of doc-string, I use i to denote run between (i - 1)-th and i-th restart, i.e. i starts from 1. This puts i - 1 to the exponents. Maybe it would be better to start with run i = 0. The epochs in PyTorch start with 0 as well. The parameter `T_max` could be then called `T_0`. Please let me know.
